name: Verdict
desc: A weapon once used by a young maiden who forsook her family name, stained with the blood of enemies and loved ones both.
passive: Increases ATK by 20%. When characters in your party obtain Elemental Shards from Crystallize reactions, the equipping character will gain 1 Seal, increasing Elemental Skill DMG by 18%. The Seal lasts for 15s, and the equipper may have up to 2 Seals at once. All of the equipper's Seals will disappear 0.2s after their Elemental Skill deals DMG.
affix: Many Oaths of Dawn and Dusk
